titleStmt.title: A review of what God hath been pleased to do this year, according to prophecy and particularly near the 23d of the month we stile August : in the general peace, and the Muscovian and imperial victories over the Turks : with a most humble apology and defence concerning the falling short of events, of what was expected according to the interpretation of that sure word of prophecy / by T. Beverley.
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Marshal... and John M[a]rshal ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: God hath pleased to do this year, &c.
